name: Island Builder 2 Betas
description:
Disclaimer:

Welcome to the Island Builder 2 Beta! This is the place where you can get early access to Island Builder 2 betas. The features right now do not show a clear picture on how the final game will be. Expect constant updates, as there is more updates this description will be more filled.

This Game Will Have Bugs!

Have you ever wanted to build a floating Island of your dreams, no? well, its not really on everyone's bucket list, but It is on your's now! Build your very own Island in the sky, with more features constantly around the corner this game is a must have!

If you find a bug or have feature suggestions, please comment them!
